name: NSWindowController
desc: A controller that manages a window, usually a window stored in a nib file.

items.name: loadWindow
items.desc: Loads the receiver’s window from the nib file.

items.name: showWindow
items.desc: Displays the window associated with the receiver.

items.name: isWindowLoaded
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the nib file containing the receiver’s window has been loaded.

items.name: window
items.desc: The window owned by the receiver.

items.name: windowDidLoad
items.desc: Sent after the window owned by the receiver has been loaded.

items.name: windowWillLoad
items.desc: Sent before the window owned by the receiver is loaded.

items.name: document
items.desc: The document associated with the window controller.

items.name: setDocumentEdited
items.desc: Sets the document edited flag for the window controller.

items.name: close
items.desc: Closes the window if it was loaded.

items.name: shouldCloseDocument
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver necessarily closes the associated document when the window it manages is closed.

items.name: owner
items.desc: The owner of the nib file containing the window managed by the receiver.

items.name: storyboard
items.desc: The storyboard file from which the window controller was loaded.

items.name: windowNibName
items.desc: The name of the nib file that stores the window associated with the receiver.

items.name: windowNibPath
items.desc: The full path of the nib file that stores the window associated with the receiver.

items.name: shouldCascadeWindows
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the window will cascade in relation to other document windows when it is displayed.

items.name: windowFrameAutosaveName
items.desc: The name under which the frame rectangle of the window owned by the receiver is stored in the defaults database.

items.name: synchronizeWindowTitleWithDocumentName
items.desc: Synchronizes the displayed window title and the represented filename with the information in the associated document.

items.name: windowTitle
items.desc: Returns the window title to be used for a given document display name.

items.name: contentViewController
items.desc: The view controller for the window’s content view.

items.name: dismissController
items.desc: Dismisses the window controller.
